arts.ttl: Everton vs Mansfield Town – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton play their first ever cup match at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium on Wednesday night, welcoming League One side Mansfield Town for the second round of the Carabao Cup. After securing a historic first win at the venue against Brighton on Sunday, the mood on Merseyside is positive. arts.ttl: Everton vs Mansfield Town – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Everton and Mansfield Town meet for the first time in their histories on Wednesday night in the second round of the Carabao Cup. The historic fixture will also be the first ever cup tie played at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium.
